dmca.title: Implix complains of copied search marketing materials
dmca.body:
Regarding:
My Net-Marketing Center, LLC
[private]
Minden, NV 89423 
United States


ref. no. 2006/0011DMCAIIX

Subject: Infringement Notification
To whom it may concern:

I am instructed by Mr.[private], the CEO of Implix, one of the largest and most popular marketing service providers on the Internet established in 1998, and the owner of Implix.com website.

It has recently come to our attention that My Net-Marketing Center LLC the owner of http://www.mynetmarketingcenter.com/ has blatantly copied design and content from the Implix.com website to promote its competitive product and by doing so allegedly infringed the exclusive rights of Implix Sp. z o.o.

We strongly believe that these infringements fall within the Digital Millennium Copyright Act and other applicable intellectual property laws in the US and the European Union (i.e. art. 78 Section 1 of the Polish Copyrights Law of Feb. 4th, 1994 and art. 3 Section 1 of the Act on Combating Unfair Competition of April 16th, 1993). For that reason, my principal is seeking removal of online materials that were protected by the fair use pursuant to sections 512(g)(2) and (3) of the Digital Millennium Copyrights Act.

We kindly ask for removal of the following search links, Google AdWords advertisements and Google Groups listings from Google:


Search query: 'mynetmarketing':

* mynetmarketingcenter.com http://mynetmarketingcenter.com/

* www.advertiserpro.com/Inkldr.asp?ID=1&LK=1

[private]
